item.title: Hacking Semantris: The Google AI Experiment
item.description: Semantris is a set of word association games that use semantic search to predict a relevant word in the game based on the player’s input. ARCADE Arcade mode requires a player to quickly come up with associated words for certain words. You are supposed to think and type as fast as you can before an increasing list of words fills your screen. BLOCKS Blocks is a turn-based game mode.
